content: from knitty > i love stranded knitting but definitely dislike weaving the ends so i came up these tams they are worked in the round in what i call beginner s fair isle knitting using a variegated yarn as the contrast color you are able to achieve the effect of a more complicated fair isle pattern by using just the same two strands from cast on to bind off choose your favourite variegated worsted weight yarn or simply some leftovers for your own unique tams they are quick to make and fun to knit
